resources.string: Ready Reckoner for Feeding of Crossbred Dairy Cow and Milch Buffalo

We are happy to introduce an android application for formulating ration for crossbred dairy cow and milch buffalo. Balanced ration is formulated based on level of milk production i.e., 5, 7.5, 10, 12.5, 15 and 20 lit/day for a cow weighing 400 kg at different levels of availability of green fodder per day. Similarly for milch buffalo balanced ration is formulated based on level of milk production i.e., 3, 6, 9 and 12 lit/day and weighing 450 kg at different levels of availability of green fodder per day (High, moderate and low). Available in : English I Hindi I Tamil I Kannada I Telugu I Malayalam I Oriya I Marathi. Click cow or buffalo picture
